topics.body:
The stock market is falling, all of my stocks are in the red

I have a profit overall, and there's two days left in the game

Should I just give up and sell all my stocks and just wait silently until it's over or should I go down with this sinking ship and hope like hell it skyrockets in the next two days? If I sell now I'll still be in the green overall, but if I wait two more days I could possibly lose even more.
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554a60806368722f63750f00#post_554a60806368722f63750f00
Sell off exactly enough to make a profit and keep the rest going, that way you make money either way with a chance of more profits,

Putting this into perspective: you start with $1,000,000

Guy in first: *$18,000,000*

Guy in second: *$4,000,000*

Everyone else: hovering around $1,000,000 still

I've made only like $14,000 after all of this
